comments.body: I would add an example here (in the doc-string); I think all the other examples are resulting as strings anyhow (could also modify an example to avoid making this longer). you can check docs in reshape.rst to see if anything needs updating.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +200,204 @@
        .. versionadded:: 0.20.0

        .. versionchanged:: 0.22.0
            When all suffixes are numeric, they are cast to int64/float64.
